/* Further reading */ added Rolling Stone article "Destiny's Child"; removed sources referenced in text: "The Path to Power" and "The Great Black Hope"; added accessdates
/* Books authored */ added cite to article "The Path to Power" (includes details about the writing of "The Audacity of Hope")
/* Popular culture */ restored lead to Crouch comment: "conversely" (adverb) with the terms of the relation reversed see http://www.onelook.com/?w=conversely; updated accessdates
